name: Notification of Appointment Rescheduling
description: Notification sent when an existing appointment has been rescheduled to a different date or time
businessPurpose: Notify auxiliary applications and systems that an existing appointment has been moved to a different date/time slot
timing: Sent immediately after an appointment is rescheduled to new date/time in the scheduling system
realWorldScenarios: Patient requests appointment change due to schedule conflict
Provider reschedules due to emergency coverage needs
Surgery rescheduled due to equipment maintenance
Clinic appointment moved due to provider illness
Radiology appointment rescheduled for better preparation time
Follow-up visit moved earlier due to clinical urgency

generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - rescheduling accuracy critical for patient communication and resource management
